OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - GET OUT AND ABOUT

Desc.entry: A bespoke chargeable support service that is open to anyone aged 50 years and over, including those in receipt of direct payments, and is designed to help clients to continue to live independently. The service is tailored to the individual needs of the client via support planning. A flexible service which can provide temporary or regular assistance, support can include building up confidence by helping people to get to social activities, use public transport and get to family events or appointments. Please contact for further information. A registered charity and company limited by guarantee no 5207254
